title: How farmer's in India's Sundarbans area are using climate smart agriculture

tasks.task: Arrive at Bongeri village after effort to find it.
subtasks: Drive to Bongeri village in South 24th Parganas, West Bengal.
Recall village devastation in 2009 cyclone Islay.
Note waterlogging and inability to grow crops prior to pilot project.

tasks.task: Acknowledge the National Initiative on Climate Resilient Agriculture's involvement.
subtasks: Recognize the Initiative's pilot project in Bongeri.
Note support from the European soybean company.
Identify use of native and local plants.
Note focus on sustainable land management.
Observe flourishing farms and successful pisciculture.
Confirm training on soil testing and reducing chemical use.
Note practical application of these skills (e.g., soil testing).
